name: The Fae Court
description: An ancient civilization of nature spirits, fae creatures, and forest guardians. The Fae Court wields powerful illusion magic, enchantments, and commands the forces of nature itself.
lore: Since before mortals walked the world, the Fae Court has ruled the deep forests and enchanted groves. Led by their eternal Queen, the fairies are masters of illusion and nature magic. Though their forms appear delicate, they wield tremendous magical power. At night, when moonlight bathes the world, their strength reaches its zenith. The Fae are capricious - they may aid those who respect nature or bring ruin to those who defile it.

strengths.name: Night Power
strengths.description: +25% damage and +20% movement speed at night

strengths.name: Masters of Illusion
strengths.description: Illusion abilities cost 25% less mana and last 30% longer

strengths.name: Nature Bond
strengths.description: Buildings regenerate health and are immune to poison. Units heal when near trees.

strengths.name: Mana Affinity
strengths.description: +30% mana regeneration and Moon Wells provide bonus resources

weaknesses.name: Fragile Forms
weaknesses.description: Most units have -15% health compared to other races

weaknesses.name: Costly Magic
weaknesses.description: Advanced units and spells cost 20% more mana

weaknesses.name: Iron Bane
weaknesses.description: Take 15% extra damage from normal (iron) weapons

unique_mechanics.name: Night Power
unique_mechanics.description: Fairy units and buildings gain significant bonuses during nighttime. Moon Wells recharge faster at night.

unique_mechanics.name: Illusion Copies
unique_mechanics.description: Many abilities create illusory copies of units that deal reduced damage but can confuse enemies

unique_mechanics.name: Living Architecture
unique_mechanics.description: All buildings are living trees that slowly regenerate health and can uproot to move (slowly)

unique_mechanics.name: Moon Wells
unique_mechanics.description: Moon Wells provide mana and health regeneration to nearby units and serve as secondary resource generation

unique_mechanics.name: Nature Synergy
unique_mechanics.description: Units near forests and natural terrain gain bonus evasion and movement speed
